Html:
I followed all instructions for installation and installed dot net 4.0 . i have my wsus on a server 2003 R2 64 bit . Installed the Certs fine and i go threw the steps for creating a flash player update and publish then it gets to this screen which says "Wsus Package Publisher cannot contain child element because parent element's content model is empty" ive also uploaded a picture to the following link

https://skydrive.live.com/redir?resid=2E92B80F31C901CB!136
Hi Badassbaz, When this happen, go to 'Help' -> 'Send Debug info' and click 'Yes' to send the file. I will analyse this.

Do you have found the time to sent me the debug file ? I didn't received any ?
I can't do much with only the screen capture. I need to look at the XML file.
did a debug thing today about 8 hours ago

ARHHHH sussed out what was wrong i needed a wsus update http://blogs.technet.com/b/sus/archive/2012/09/04/an-update-for-windows-server-update-services-3-0-service-pack-2-is-available-kb2734608.aspx
